mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAFE( CAFENUMBER, NAME, OPTIONNAME, PRICE, LOCATION, BUSINESSNUMBER, IMAGE1, IMAGE2 )VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(cafeNUMBER),0)+1 FROM CAFE), #{name}, #{optionName}, #{price}, #{location}, #{businessNumber}, #{image1}, #{image2} )
mapper.select: SELECT CAFENUMBER, NAME, OPTIONNAME, PRICE, LOCATION, IMAGE1, IMAGE2 FROM CAFE CAFENUMBER = #{cafeNumber}

choose.when: WHERE NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR PRICE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR LOCATION LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
